name: The Lancaster Leak - Crisis At Call Center
name_original: The Lancaster Leak - Crisis At Call Center
description:
Episode 2 - CRISIS AT CALL CENTER

It seems another tape has been leaked as FBI intern Valerie Bardot is still missing. To prove a point, the leakers have up the ante.

3rd Person TWIST


Play through the perspective of multiple security cams, hacked computers, and wiretapped phones.

SOMETHING IS LURKING


A new tape means a new entity...

Features

  • 30 minutes long
  • Linear story
  • Jumpscares

Playing first game is recommended but not required.

https://store.steampowered.com/app/2356440/The_Lancaster_Leak__OBrien_State_Park/
